16_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: ZeroTorrent is fully user supported, so if you have any torrents lying around, make sure you upload them!
Also, it needs more categories like "books, audiobooks, sports" etc. And it would also be helpful if you could downvote torrents. That way people can tell others that it is dead or something harmful.

> [sirenyc](#comment_60_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ): Up!

Hey sirenyc!! Someone else is also trying to create a torrent site on here using your Zerotorrent as a basis. I think you guys should team up! Let's get something amazing off the ground here!

PS his name is "genericusername", he's doing the KAT clone.
